title: Pieter Delobelle
subtitle: Hi. I'm a PhD researcher on artificial intelligence, verifiability, and NLP at the KU Leuven under the supervision of Luc De Raedt and Bettina Berendt. I'm a member of the DTAI lab that focusses on machine learning and knowledge representation.
RSS_subtitle: My blog about my research on AI, verification and NLP. Currently working at DTAI lab in the KU Leuven.
